story: The Celestial Isles of Everlasting Dawn were once a realm of unparalleled beauty and harmony. However, dark shadows began to creep across the lands, threatening to plunge the world into eternal night. The Ethereal Void Stalker, known as Nethergeist, emerged from the depths of the void, spreading fear and despair wherever it roamed. The Shadow Legion, led by Nethergeist, consisted of the Phantasmal Roarbeast, a Spectral Lion Guardian, and the Faedryad, an Enchanted Forest Guardian.
greetingGameMessage: Welcome to the Celestial Isles of Everlasting Dawn, brave adventurer. Beware the shadows that lurk, for the darkness grows stronger with each passing moment.
defeatEndingMessage: With the defeat of Nethergeist and the Shadow Legion, the Celestial Isles of Everlasting Dawn are free once more. Light and harmony return to the lands, and the people rejoice in the victory of good over evil.
gameOverMessage: Alas, the darkness proved too powerful. Nethergeist and the Shadow Legion have enveloped the Celestial Isles of Everlasting Dawn in eternal night. Hope fades as the world succumbs to the malevolent forces of the void.
